US House Republicans forge ahead with TikTok bill despite TrumpRepublicans in the U.S. House of Representatives vowed on Tuesday to forge ahead with a vote to ban the popular TikTok social media app, despite the concerns of Donald Trump, who holds great influence over their slim House majority. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 20:50:35 GMT TCDGQPGZNRM7PBCNKDT2O22FPU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-house-republicans-forge-ahead-with-tiktok-bill-despite-trump-2024-03-12/David Morgan世界美国
Tesla official talks up Southeast Asia expansion as China's BYD pulls aheadTesla's expansion into Southeast Asia is a priority, a senior executive said on Tuesday, highlighting the fast-growing market where the U.S. electric-vehicle maker faces competition from China's BYD. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:12:19 GMT QRJOB7RR5JJ3DC3D3JR5CIRORU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-official-talks-up-southeast-asia-expansion-chinas-bid-pulls-ahead-2024-03-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
US spy chief "cannot rule out" that China would use TikTok to influence US electionsChina could use social media app TikTok to influence the 2024 U.S. elections, U.S. Director of National Intelligence Avril Haines told a House of Representatives intelligence committee hearing on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 16:27:38 GMT AH7NQNVWMNKQHMM2LNYBCBZSZE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-spy-chief-cannot-rule-out-that-c​​hina-would-use-tiktok-to-influence-us-elections-2024-03-12/Michael Martina, Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Saying 'China is watching,' US spy chiefs plead for Ukraine aidLeaders of U.S. intelligence agencies urgently pressed members of the House of Representatives on Tuesday to approve additional military assistance for Ukraine, saying it would not only boost Kyiv as it fights Russia but discourage Chinese aggression. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 15:57:02 GMT 5VFL6RTS6RN4PBYLBVGBUVTOBA https://www.reuters.com/world/saying-china-is-watching-us-spy-chiefs-plead-ukraine-aid-2024-03-12/Patricia Zengerle, Michael Martina世界
Nissan, Honda consider China output cuts, Nikkei reportsJapan's Nissan Motor and Honda Motor are considering cutting production in China as they face stiff competition from BYD and other electric vehicle makers, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:33:43 GMT BGVWWQ74PRKDBOZRZQII4KTJKQ https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/nissan-honda-consider-china-output-cuts-nikkei-reports-2024-03-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
STMicroelectronics CEO says China is a growth market despite US chip warChina remains an important growth market for French-Italian semiconductor STMicroelectronics, despite increasing U.S-China tensions over semiconductors, the company's chief executive said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:11:13 GMT FLCCWFFHDVMYDJOLI35AFOYOVY https://www.reuters.com/technology/stmicro electronics-ceo-says-china-is-growth-market-despite-us-chip-war-2024-03-12/Reuters技术
